metadata.title: CVE-2024-39308 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: RailsAdmin is a Rails engine that provides an interface for managing data.RailsAdmin list view has the XSS vulnerability, caused byimproperly-escaped HTML title attribute. Upgrade to 3.1.3 or 2.2.2 (to bereleased).

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-admin package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
